name: phantom-files
title: Phantom Files
description: Master your macOS file visibility - toggle hidden files globally or hide/unhide specific files with quick commands. Perfect for decluttering or securing sensitive files.
author: fahidnasir

commands.name: hide-this
commands.title: Hide This
commands.subtitle: Make selected items invisible in Finder
commands.description:
Uses `chflags hidden` on currently selected Finder items.
Works with both files and folders.

commands.name: reveal-this
commands.title: Reveal This
commands.subtitle: Unhide selected Finder items
commands.description: Applies `chflags nohidden` to unhide files/folder in Finder.

commands.name: ghost-mode
commands.title: Ghost Mode
commands.subtitle: Toggle show/hide all hidden files
commands.description: Switches macOS hidden tile visibility globally (defaults write AppleShowAllFiles).

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
